Description_lang: The caster fires off a volley of fire arrows that inflict $m1 Fire damage to victims in range every $t1 seconds. Entering an area of Freezing Water will remove this effect.When Huo-Shuang casts this spell he leaves a Smoldering Ruin at his location.
AuraDescription_lang: Suffering $m1 Fire damage every $t1 seconds.Enter an area of Freezing Water to remove this effect.
